title: Geraline's Portfolio
text:

title: Geraline's Portfolio
text:
BIO
My name is Geraline Trossi-Torres. I’m a second-year PhD student in the Biological Sciences Department at the University of Idaho. I am part of Dr. Scott Grieshaber’s lab, which is interested in understanding the developmental cycle of Chlamydia trachomatis. Our lab uses various molecular biology techniques, specifically promoter-reporter plasmid vectors.


EDUCATION
Ph.D. Student – Microbiology/Molecular Biology/Biochemistry (MMBB) - 2023 - Present
University of Idaho, Moscow, ID
Master’s Degree of Science - Biomolecular Sciences - 2020 – 2022
Boise State University, Boise, ID
Master’s Degree of Science – Biotechnology - 2016 – 2018
Pontifical Catholic University of Puerto Rico, Ponce, PR
Bachelor’s Degree of Science – Biotechnology - 2011 – 2016
University of Puerto Rico - Ponce, Ponce, PR

title: Geraline Trossi-Torres
text: Hello, everyone! Welcome to my Website! My name is Geraline Trossi-Torres. I’m a second-year PhD student in the Biological Sciences Department at the University of Idaho. I enjoy reading good sci-fi and fantasy books when I am not in the lab doing research. If not, I’ll be playing with my Xbox or Nintendo Switch.
